Key Match Events: The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 131-114.
Ja Morant and LeBron James engaged in a heated exchange during the game.
Morant received a technical foul for shoving James.
The Grizzlies had three players scoring 20 points in the game: Ja Morant, Jaren Jackson Jr., and rookie Jaylen Wells.
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant expressed his disdain for the Lakers, stating, 'I don't like them. They knocked me out of the playoffs.'
LeBron James downplayed the altercation, attributing it to competitive spirit.
Morant celebrated the victory by posting a GIF of a man doing a Griddy dance, further taunting the Lakers after their defeat.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rivalry between the two teams has intensified after the Lakers defeated Memphis in the 2023 playoffs.
The Lakers struggled in the absence of Anthony Davis and Rui Hachimura, finishing their road trip at 1-4.
Memphis' victory marks a continuation of their strong performances, improving their season record to 5-4, while the Lakers fell to 4-4.
